description:
Big comfort for little bums. A slighly curved shape is great for city or trail riding, with soft foam padding throughout to keep everyone happy on long rides.

  • Neutral shape and generous padding relieves pressure for comfortable movement on the seat
  • Front and rear edge guards protect saddle during tumbles
  • Includes traditional 7/8in. saddle clamp for compatibility with older seatposts without an integrated clamp
name: 49N Perch Saddle - Children
